short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to customize the appearance of ChatGPT and hide specific messages for a cleaner user experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* The extension is named “ChatGPT Theme & Hide messages”.
* It allows users to customize the appearance of ChatGPT.
* It provides the functionality to hide specific messages for a cleaner user experience.
* This extension works with the light mode of ChatGPT only. It does not support the dark mode.
